title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
The Capitol Police Board has four members. A U.S. News article on Tuesday about the anniversary of last year's Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol incorrectly said the board has five members.

(See: "U.S. News: Threats Grow Ahead of Riot's Anniversary" -- WSJ Jan. 4, 2022

---

The S&P 500 rose 30.38 points, or 0.6%, to 4796.56 on Monday. The Monday's Markets article in Tuesday's Business & Finance section incorrectly contained the stray word "losing."

(See: "Monday's Markets: Dow, S&P Start Year by Hitting Records --- Apple briefly touches $3 trillion in market capitalization as Nasdaq rises 1.2%" -- WSJ Jan. 4, 2022

---

Notice to readers

Some Wall Street Journal staff members are working remotely during the pandemic. Please send reader comments only by email or phone, using the contacts below, not via U.S. Mail.

---

Readers can alert The Wall Street Journal to any errors in news articles by e-mailing wsjcontact@wsj.com or by calling 888-410-2667.
